entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or drizzle beginning this evening then changing to snow or rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
